CC=/usr/bin/gcc CFLAGS="-Wall -DDEBUG -g -O3 -march=i686" ./configure  \

 --with-suexec-umask=022

creator: root@nk.ca
jorton@redhat.com
text: Take -DDEBUG out of CFLAGS to work around this.

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
This is an upstream issue with the combined -D DEBUG CFLAGS and PCRE, Im going
for won't fix, since we don't use -D DEBUG in many places anyways.
